original_text: If you do not know what is true, do not speak against your neighbour in court. Do not deceive people with what you say.
korean_text: 너는 까닭 없이 네 이웃을 쳐서 증인이 되지 말며 네 입술로 속이지 말지니라

sentences.original_text: If you do not know what is true
do not speak against your neighbour in court
Do not deceive people with what you say
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 하는 말로 사람들을 속이지 말라
